issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: webhdfs
components.description: WebHDFS: HTTP REST API for HDFS

fields.description: The current API returns a single delegation token, that method from the FileSystem API is deprecated in favor of the one that returns a list of tokens. The HTTP API should implement the new/undeprecated signature getDelegationTokens().
fields.summary: webhdfs HTTP API should implement getDelegationTokens() instead getDelegationToken()

comments.body: This is not a problem in 1.0.0 (or 0.20s, 0.20.205) since the new getDelegationTokens(..) API does not exist in those branches.
h2594_20111130.patch: add GETDELEGATIONTOKENS and CREATESYMLINK.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12505711/h2594_20111130.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 8 new or modified tests.

    -1 patch.  The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1619//console

This message is automatically generated.
h2594_20111130_no_apt.patch: same patch without the apt doc update.

+1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12505712/h2594_20111130_no_apt.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 8 new or modified tests.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1620//testReport/
